website_summaries.verdict: Try this first if you're looking for a hair mask that will combat frizz.
pros: Adds shine without leaving your hair greasy
cons: Can weigh your hair down if used too frequently

customer_reviews.title: Used - Don’t believe what’s left is real product
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged in plastic bag not sealed box - No inner lid to be removed before use as with all Kerastase prodcuts, clearly used and HALF the product was gone . Had two colored rubber bands around seal area. I don’t believe the product in there was real, Since I was in the shower when I discovered all this I put it on my hair got out and it instantly frizzed terribly .
customer_reviews.author: Pleshette

customer_reviews.title: Kerastase Discipline is very similar..and easy to get.
customer_reviews.text: One star doesn’t reflect product, just the price gouging. I was upset when Kerastase discontinued the Oleo Relax Masque. I was paying a lot for it from sellers like this, who jacked the price up because of demand. Please be aware that the new Kerastase Discipline line is very similar and really good. I switched from this to that, and it’s fine. You don’t have to pay 3-4x the price to get something that’s hard to find now.
customer_reviews.author: LolaTru

customer_reviews.title: Best Product Ever!
customer_reviews.text: If you have curly or frizzy hair this is the best! I use it every wash , every 3rd day. Leave it in while shaving after shampoo before conditioning. It’s changed my life!!! LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.author: judith sweren

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money trying to find a substitute
customer_reviews.text: After a year of trying to find something cheaper, I broke down and just reordered my Holy Grail. I didn’t even realize how dry my hair had gotten and how much I had been struggling with it until I used this mask again. Doesn’t take much and lasts me about 3 months. You wear your hair every day- totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: biteycat

customer_reviews.title: Great for thick hair, curls
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend and I saw this product on a list of the products Meghan Markel uses on her hair so I bought it for her since she has similar hair. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom S.

customer_reviews.title: BE AWARE
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE BE AWARE! The item in description IS NOT the item in photos. The photo is of the large salon size product. The product received was the small size. Size pictured is a 16.9oz. The item received is a 6.8oz.
customer_reviews.author: fun

customer_reviews.title: Moisture for your hair!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product for my hair as it dries out easily due to travel. I use it once a month and it give me the moisture I need
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. A little goes a long way. Smells so good!!! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R

customer_reviews.title: Great for Curly Hair
customer_reviews.text: This works so well on my naturally curly hair. It cuts down on the frizz in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hair mask!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair mask. Just a little bit goes a long way and Leaves my hair so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware - don't let the picture fool you
customer_reviews.text: The Big picture shows as a 500ml item, it generates a wrong impression to make people thought you are buying the 500ml product, read carefully, the title stated at the end 6.76 Ounce, it is only for a 200 ml product.
customer_reviews.author: T. SU

customer_reviews.title: Meghan Markel got me here
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. May hair is shiny, soft and I got lots of complements on how healthy it looks. Smells great too!
customer_reviews.author: Carle

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great, feeling the effect only if staying with mask 20; minutes with hut towel onthe head
customer_reviews.author: Nataly

product_meta.title: Kerastase Nutritive Oleo-Relax Masque, 6.76 Ounce
product_meta.description: Kerastase Masque Oleo-Relax is a smoothing masque to discipline dry, frizzy, unmanageable hair. Its smoothing formula will leave hair soft and silky whilst the Anti-Frizz Protection properties prevent it turning unmanageable in humid weather. Kerastase Masque Oleo-Relax is formulated with Nutri-Huile Complex, containing shorea and palm oils and Anti-Frizz Protection formula, a soluble silicone derivative, which work to smooth and nourish your dry, frizzy, unmanageable hair. Hair will benefit from improved softness and long-lasting volume and control.
